cn.title: 派钱包关于恢复 BTG 充提的公告

message.data: 由于 BTG 主网升级，为了保证平台用户利益，比特派将于2018年6月30日13:00(香港时间)暂停派钱包和派银行中 BTG 的充提，并将于后续主网升级完成且运行稳定后，重新开放 BTG 充提功能。具体时间请关注后续通知。
请注意，充提服务暂停期间：请不要进行 BTG 的收发，以免造成不必要的资产损失！
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持，不便之处，敬请谅解。

en.title: Notice of Suspending BTG Deposit and Withdrawal Services

message.data: Due to the upgrade of BTG mainnet and for the sake of your interests, Bitpie will suspend BTG deposit and withdrawals in Bitpie Wallet and Pie Bank at 13:00 on June 30, 2018(GMT+8). We will resume the deposit and withdrawal of BTG promptly after the BTG mainnet runs stably. Please pay attention to our announcement for the specific time.
Attention: Please do not send or receive BTG in your Bitpie wallet during the suspension of BTG deposit and withdrawals, or else you may lose your assets.
Your support for Bitpie is greatly appreciated!
